name: Saheeh International
text: When the Occurrence occurs,

name: Saheeh International
text: There is, at its occurrence, no denial.

name: Saheeh International
text: It will bring down [some] and raise up [others].

name: Saheeh International
text: When the earth is shaken with convulsion

name: Saheeh International
text: And the mountains are broken down, crumbling

name: Saheeh International
text: And become dust dispersing.

name: Saheeh International
text: And you become [of] three kinds:

name: Saheeh International
text: Then the companions of the right - what are the companions of the right?

name: Saheeh International
text: And the companions of the left - what are the companions of the left?

name: Saheeh International
text: And the forerunners, the forerunners -

name: Saheeh International
text: Those are the ones brought near [to Allah]

name: Saheeh International
text: In the Gardens of Pleasure,

name: Saheeh International
text: A [large] company of the former peoples

name: Saheeh International
text: And a few of the later peoples,

name: Saheeh International
text: On thrones woven [with ornament],

name: Saheeh International
text: Reclining on them, facing each other.

name: Saheeh International
text: There will circulate among them young boys made eternal

name: Saheeh International
text: With vessels, pitchers and a cup [of wine] from a flowing spring -

name: Saheeh International
text: No headache will they have therefrom, nor will they be intoxicated -

name: Saheeh International
text: And fruit of what they select

name: Saheeh International
text: And the meat of fowl, from whatever they desire.

name: Saheeh International
text: And [for them are] fair women with large, [beautiful] eyes,

name: Saheeh International
text: The likenesses of pearls well-protected,

name: Saheeh International
text: As reward for what they used to do.

name: Saheeh International
text: They will not hear therein ill speech or commission of sin -

name: Saheeh International
text: Only a saying: "Peace, peace."

name: Saheeh International
text: The companions of the right - what are the companions of the right?

name: Saheeh International
text: [They will be] among lote trees with thorns removed

name: Saheeh International
text: And [banana] trees layered [with fruit]

name: Saheeh International
text: And shade extended

name: Saheeh International
text: And water poured out

name: Saheeh International
text: And fruit, abundant [and varied],

name: Saheeh International
text: Neither limited [to season] nor forbidden,

name: Saheeh International
text: And [upon] beds raised high.

name: Saheeh International
text: Indeed, We have produced the women of Paradise in a [new] creation

name: Saheeh International
text: And made them virgins,

name: Saheeh International
text: Devoted [to their husbands] and of equal age,

name: Saheeh International
text: For the companions of the right [who are]

name: Saheeh International
text: A company of the former peoples

name: Saheeh International
text: And a company of the later peoples.

name: Saheeh International
text: And the companions of the left - what are the companions of the left?

name: Saheeh International
text: [They will be] in scorching fire and scalding water

name: Saheeh International
text: And a shade of black smoke,

name: Saheeh International
text: Neither cool nor beneficial.

name: Saheeh International
text: Indeed they were, before that, indulging in affluence,

name: Saheeh International
text: And they used to persist in the great violation,

name: Saheeh International
text: And they used to say, "When we die and become dust and bones, are we indeed to be resurrected?

name: Saheeh International
text: And our forefathers [as well]?"

name: Saheeh International
text: Say, [O Muhammad], "Indeed, the former and the later peoples

name: Saheeh International
text: Are to be gathered together for the appointment of a known Day."

name: Saheeh International
text: Then indeed you, O those astray [who are] deniers,

name: Saheeh International
text: Will be eating from trees of zaqqum

name: Saheeh International
text: And filling with it your bellies

name: Saheeh International
text: And drinking on top of it from scalding water

name: Saheeh International
text: And will drink as the drinking of thirsty camels.

name: Saheeh International
text: That is their accommodation on the Day of Recompense.

name: Saheeh International
text: We have created you, so why do you not believe?

name: Saheeh International
text: Have you seen that which you emit?

name: Saheeh International
text: Is it you who creates it, or are We the Creator?

name: Saheeh International
text: We have decreed death among you, and We are not to be outdone

name: Saheeh International
text: In that We will change your likenesses and produce you in that [form] which you do not know.

name: Saheeh International
text: And you have already known the first creation, so will you not remember?

name: Saheeh International
text: And have you seen that [seed] which you sow?

name: Saheeh International
text: Is it you who makes it grow, or are We the grower?

name: Saheeh International
text: If We willed, We could make it [dry] debris, and you would remain in wonder,

name: Saheeh International
text: [Saying], "Indeed, we are [now] in debt;

name: Saheeh International
text: Rather, we have been deprived."

name: Saheeh International
text: And have you seen the water that you drink?

name: Saheeh International
text: Is it you who brought it down from the clouds, or is it We who bring it down?

name: Saheeh International
text: If We willed, We could make it bitter, so why are you not grateful?

name: Saheeh International
text: And have you seen the fire that you ignite?

name: Saheeh International
text: Is it you who produced its tree, or are We the producer?

name: Saheeh International
text: We have made it a reminder and provision for the travelers,

name: Saheeh International
text: So exalt the name of your Lord, the Most Great.

name: Saheeh International
text: Then I swear by the setting of the stars,

name: Saheeh International
text: And indeed, it is an oath - if you could know - [most] great.

name: Saheeh International
text: Indeed, it is a noble Qur'an

name: Saheeh International
text: In a Register well-protected;

name: Saheeh International
text: None touch it except the purified.

name: Saheeh International
text: [It is] a revelation from the Lord of the worlds.

name: Saheeh International
text: Then is it to this statement that you are indifferent

name: Saheeh International
text: And make [the thanks for] your provision that you deny [the Provider]?

name: Saheeh International
text: Then why, when the soul at death reaches the throat

name: Saheeh International
text: And you are at that time looking on -

name: Saheeh International
text: And Our angels are nearer to him than you, but you do not see -

name: Saheeh International
text: Then why do you not, if you are not to be recompensed,

name: Saheeh International
text: Bring it back, if you should be truthful?

name: Saheeh International
text: And if the deceased was of those brought near to Allah,

name: Saheeh International
text: Then [for him is] rest and bounty and a garden of pleasure.

name: Saheeh International
text: And if he was of the companions of the right,

name: Saheeh International
text: Then [the angels will say], "Peace for you; [you are] from the companions of the right."

name: Saheeh International
text: But if he was of the deniers [who were] astray,

name: Saheeh International
text: Then [for him is] accommodation of scalding water

name: Saheeh International
text: And burning in Hellfire

name: Saheeh International
text: Indeed, this is the true certainty,

name: Saheeh International
text: So exalt the name of your Lord, the Most Great.
